data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Găgăuzia.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Găgăuzia, Moldova
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Găgăuzia to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.section_summary: On average, 12 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Găgăuzia, Moldova.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, please give the 6,216 believers in the state of Găgăuzia the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Găgăuzia to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Găgăuzia, Moldova a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, help the 6,216 believers in Găgăuzia to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Găgăuzia.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary:
the state of Găgăuzia, Moldova has a population of 134,600.

We estimate Găgăuzia has 6,216 people who might know Jesus, 95,380 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 33,004 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.
